Industry.label: Industry
Industry.value: Mining & Quarrying of Nonmetallic Minerals (No Fuels)

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Piedmont Lithium Inc, formerly Piedmont Lithium Ltd is a lithium-based company focused on the development of its Piedmont Lithium Project located within the Carolina TinSpodumene Belt (''TSB'') and along trend to the Hallman Beam and Kings Mountain mines.

value.name: Patrick Harold Brindle
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Executive Vice President
